title: DeRay Mckesson and the Summer of Chaos
subtitle: Fabricated Twitter messages claiming activist DeRay Mckesson was plotting a "summer of chaos" with Attorney General Loretta Lynch resurfaced after the Dallas police shootings.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Hacked Twitter DMs reveal that activist DeRay Mckesson planned a "summer of chaos" involving protests and riots with Attorney General Loretta Lynch.
